Tsi̍t tn̄g tsha káu tshioh.
Tsi̍t ê lâng tsi̍t khuán miā.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一个囡仔較鬧熱三个大人
Tsi̍t ê gín-á khah lāu jia̍t sann ê tuā-lâng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一个某較好三个天公祖
Tsi̍t ê bóo khah hó sann ê Thinn-kong-tsóo.
Tsi̍t ê tsînn phah jī-tsa̍p-sì ê kat.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一人一家代，公媽隨人祀
Tsi̍t lâng tsi̍t ke tāi, kong-má suî lâng tshāi.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一人煩惱一樣，無人煩惱親像
Tsi̍t lâng huân-ló tsi̍t iūnn, bô-lâng huân-ló tshin-tshiūnn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一人看出一家，新婦看出大家
Tsi̍t lâng khuànn-tshut tsi̍t ke, sin-pū khuànn-tshut ta-ke.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一代親，二代表，三代毋捌了了
It tāi tshin, jī tāi piáu, sann tāi m̄ bat liáu-liáu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一兼二顧，摸蜊仔兼洗褲
It kiam jī kòo, bong lâ-á kiam sé khòo.
Tsi̍t hun tsînn, tsi̍t hun huè.
Tsi̍t tshing sia m̄-ta̍t peh pah hiān.
Tsi̍t kù uē sann kak la̍k tsiam.
Tsi̍t tshuì kuà siang tsi̍h.
Tsi̍t nî uānn jī-tsa̍p-sì ê thâu-ke.
Tsi̍t táu khah iânn káu tsio̍h.
Tsi̍t ji̍t thì-thâu, sann ji̍t iân-tâu.
Tsi̍t ji̍t suá tsai, sann ji̍t khiā n̂g.
Tsi̍t ji̍t thó-hái, sann ji̍t pha̍k bāng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一日走拋拋，一暝點燈膋
Tsi̍t ji̍t tsáu-pha-pha, tsi̍t mê tiám ting-lâ.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一暝全頭路，天光無半步
Tsi̍t mê tsuân thâu-lōo, thinn-kng bô-puànn-pōo.
Tsi̍t ki tsháu, tsi̍t tiám lōo.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 一某無人知，兩某相卸代
Tsi̍t bóo bô-lâng tsai, nn̄g bóo sio-sià-tāi.
Tsi̍t iūnn bí tshī pah-iūnn lâng.
Tsi̍t pōo kî, tsi̍t pōo tio̍h.
Tsi̍t lia̍p tshân-lê tsú káu uánn-kong thng.
Tsi̍t lia̍p bí, pah lia̍p kuānn.
Tsi̍t hīnn-khang ji̍p, tsi̍t hīnn-khang tshut.
Tsi̍t piàn tsha̍t, pah sì tsha̍t.
Tsi̍t hiong tsi̍t sio̍k.
It tshiân, jī iân, sann suí, sì siàu-liân.
Tsi̍t tsiah gû pak siang niá phuê.
Tsi̍t tsiah sat-bó pòng kah tsuí-gû tuā.
Tsi̍t bīn buah-piah siang bīn kng.
Tshit--á khah hìng peh--á.
Tshit tsē peh pê káu huat-gê.
Tshit-gue̍h-puànn ah-á, m̄ tsai sí-ua̍h.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 三人共五目，日後無長短跤話
Sann lâng kāng gōo ba̍k, ji̍t-āu bô tn̂g-té-kha-uē.
Sann tāi lia̍p-tsik, tsi̍t tāi khîng-khong.
Sann hun lâng, tshit hun tsng.
Sann nî tsi̍t jūn, hó-pháinn tsiàu lûn.
Sann ji̍t bô liū, peh-tsiūnn tshiū.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 三百六十行，行行出狀元
Sann-pah la̍k-tsa̍p hâng, hâng-hâng tshut tsiōng-guân.
Sann kóng, sì m̄-tio̍h.
Sann kha-pōo tsi̍t khám tiàm.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 上山看山勢，入門看人意
Tsiūnn suann khuànn suann-sì, ji̍p-mn̂g khuànn lâng ì.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 上踏枋，上眠床，無洗跤睏中央
Tsiūnn ta̍h-pang, tsiūnn bîn-tshn̂g, bô sé kha khùn tiong-ng.
Tsiūnn kiō tsiah beh pàng-jiō.
Kú-tn̂g pēnn, bô hàu-tsú.
Káu-gue̍h thai, bô lâng tsai.
Khit-tsia̍h hē tuā guān.
Khit-tsia̍h iā ū sann nî hó-ūn.
Khit-tsia̍h kuánn biō-kong.
Khit-tsia̍h sin, hông-tè tshuì.
Iā tio̍h tshuê, iā tio̍h muê.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 了錢生理無人做，刣頭生理有人做
Liáu-tsînn sing-lí bô lâng tsò, thâi-thâu sing-lí ū lâng tsò.
Hōo-siong làu-khuì, kiû tsìn-pōo.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 五肢指頭仔伸出來無平長
Gōo ki tsíng-thâu-á tshun--tshut-lâi bô pênn tn̂g.
Lâng nn̄g kha, tsînn sì kha.
Lâng teh tsò, thinn teh khuànn.
Lâng sim-kuann, gû pak-tóo.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 人情世事陪到到，無鼎閣無灶
Jîn-tsîng-sè-sū puê kàu-kàu, bô tiánn koh bô tsàu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 人情留一線，日後好相看
Jîn-tsîng lâu tsi̍t suànn, ji̍t-āu hó sio-khuànn.
Lâng buē kàu, siann sing kàu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 人濟話就濟，三色人講五色話
Lâng tsē uē tō tsē, sam sik lâng kóng ngóo sik uē.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 人無照天理，天無照甲子
Lâng bô tsiàu thinn-lí, thinn bô tsiàu kah-tsí.
Lâng khan m̄ kiânn, kuí khan liù-liù-kiânn.
Lâng ê tshuì, am bē ba̍t.
Lâng nā sue, tsìng pû-á senn tshài-kue.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 人飼人，一支骨；天飼人，肥朒朒
Lâng tshī lâng, tsi̍t ki kut; thinn tshī lâng, puî-tsut-tsut.
Sian piànn sian, hāi-sí Kâu Tsê-thian.
Sio̍k mi̍h bô hó huè.
Sio̍k mi̍h tsia̍h phuà ke.
Tò tiàu bô ba̍k-tsuí.
Sīng ti giâ tsàu, sīng kiánn put-hàu.
Tsò kong-tshin, thiap pún.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 做官若清廉，食飯著攪鹽
Tsò kuann nā tshing-liâm, tsia̍h-pn̄g tio̍h kiáu iâm.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 做官騙厝內，做生理騙熟似
Tsò kuann phiàn tshù-lāi, tsò-sing-lí phiàn si̍k-sāi.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 做戲的欲煞，看戲的毋煞
Tsò-hì--ê beh suah, khuànn-hì--ê m̄ suah.
Tsò gû tio̍h thua, tsò-lâng tio̍h buâ.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 做著歹田望下冬，娶著歹某一世人
Tsò-tio̍h pháinn tshân bāng ē tang, tshuā-tio̍h pháinn bóo tsi̍t-sì-lâng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 僥倖錢，失德了；冤枉錢，跋輸筊
Hiau-hīng-tsînn, sit-tik liáu, uan-óng-tsînn, pua̍h-su kiáu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 兄弟若仝心，烏塗變成金
Hiann-tī nā kāng sim, oo-thôo piàn-sîng kim.
Ji̍p lâng mn̂g, sūn lâng ì.
Ji̍p hóo kháu, bô sí iā oo-áu.
Lāi sîn thong guā kuí.
Kong-tshin piàn sū-tsú.
La̍k-gue̍h kuà-tshài ké ū sim.
Kā Thinn-kong tsioh tánn.
Uan-ke piàn tshin-ke.
Pun bē pênn, phah kah Jī-káu-mê.
Thâi ke kà kâu.
Pa̍t-lâng ê kiánn sí bē liáu.
Ke-kiám thàn, khah bē sàn.
Ióng-ióng bé pa̍k tī tsiong-kun-thiāu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 勸人做好代，較贏食早齋
Khǹg lâng tsò hó tāi, khah-iânn tsia̍h tsá-tsai.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 勸恁有孝千萬句，袂曉有孝豬狗牛
Khǹg lín iú-hàu tshian-bān kù, bē-hiáu iú-hàu ti káu gû.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 十二月食菜頭，六月才轉嗽
Tsa̍p-jī-gue̍h tsia̍h tshài-thâu, la̍k-gue̍h tsiah tńg-sàu.
Tsa̍p-jī senn-siùnn piàn-thàu-thàu.
Tsa̍p tshuì káu kha-tshng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 十囝十新婦，賰一个老寡婦
Tsa̍p kiánn tsa̍p sin-pū, tshun tsi̍t ê lāu kuá-hū.
Tsa̍p tsáinn tshun-tshut, bô pênn tn̂g.
Tshian sǹg bān sǹg, m̄-ta̍t thinn tsi̍t ue̍h.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 千途萬途，毋值得翻田塗
Tshian tôo bān tôo, m̄ ta̍t-tit huan tshân thôo.
Tshian kim bé tshù, bān kim bé tshù-pinn.
O-ló kah ē tak-tsi̍h.
Huê-siūnn thâu lia̍h sat-bó.
Tshuì-tûn-phuê sio khuán-thāi.
Tshuì tsia̍h, hōo kha-tshng tshē-siàu.
Tshuì pá ba̍k-tsiu iau.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 嚴官府出厚賊；嚴爸母出阿里不達
Giâm kuann-hú tshut kāu tsha̍t; giâm pē-bú tshut a-lí-put-ta̍t.
Kiánn-sài sī puàn-tsú.
Gín-á-lâng kha-tshng sann táu hué.
Gín-á-lâng ū hīnn bô tshuì.
Înn--lâng ē pínn, pínn--lâng ē înn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 在生一粒豆，較贏死了拜豬頭
Tsāi-senn tsi̍t lia̍p tāu, khah iânn sí-liáu pài ti-thâu.
Tsē hōo tsiànn, tit lâng thiànn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 外甥食母舅，親像食豆腐
Guē-sing tsia̍h bú-kū, tshin-tshiūnn tsia̍h tāu-hū.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 大人儉一喙，囡仔食甲飫
Tuā-lâng khiām tsi̍t tshuì, gín-á tsia̍h kah uì.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 大人愛趁錢，囡仔愛過年
Tuā-lâng ài thàn-tsînn, gín-á ài kuè-nî.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 大人生日食肉，囡仔生日食拍
Tuā-lâng senn-ji̍t tsia̍h bah, gín-á senn-ji̍t tsia̍h phah.
Tuā-keh ke bān thî.
Tuā káu puânn tshiûnn, sè káu khuànn-iūnn.
Tāi-kah-khe pàng tsháu-hî──ū tsún bô.
Tuā-ba̍k sin-niû bô khuànn-kìnn tsàu.
Tuā uánn koh buán kînn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 大紅花毋知䆀，圓仔花䆀毋知
Tuā-âng-hue m̄ tsai bái, înn-á-hue bái m̄ tsai.
Tuā-sè-ba̍k, kuân-kē-hīnn.
Tuā-tn̂g kò sió-tn̂g.
Tuā-tsi̍h koh hìng thi̍h.
Tuā tiánn buē kún, sè tiánn tshiâng-tshiâng-kún.
Thinn-kong thiànn gōng-lâng.
Thinn-tíng Thinn-kong, tē-ē bú-kū-kong.
Hó iā tsi̍t kù, pháinn iā tsi̍t kù.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 好囝毋免濟，濟囝餓死爸
Hó kiánn m̄-bián tsē, tsē kiánn gō-sí pē.
Hó-hó hāu thâi kah sái ná lâu.
Hó-sim hōo luî tsim.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 好歹在心內，喙脣皮相款待
Hó-pháinn tsāi sim-lāi, tshuì-tûn-phuê sio khuán-thāi.
Hó tshân-tē put-jû hó tsú-tē.
Hó-tsiú tîm àng-té.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 好額毋值著會食，好命毋值著勇健
Hó-gia̍h m̄-ta̍t-tio̍h ē tsia̍h, hó miā m̄-ta̍t-tio̍h ióng-kiānn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 媒人保入房，無保一世人
Muê-lâng pó ji̍p pâng, bô pó tsi̍t-sì-lâng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 媠䆀無比止，愛著較慘死
Suí bái bô pí tsí, ài-tio̍h khah-tshám sí.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 嫁雞綴雞飛，嫁狗綴狗走
Kè ke tuè ke pue, kè káu tuè káu tsáu.
Hiâm huè tsiah sī bé huè lâng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 家和萬事興，家亂萬世窮
Ka hô bān-sū hing, ka luān bān-sè kîng.
Ka-kī phóng sái buah bīn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 家己栽一欉，較贏看別人
Ka-kī tsai tsi̍t tsâng, khah iânn khuànn pa̍t-lâng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 少年若無一擺戇，路邊哪有有應公
Siàu-liân nā bô tsi̍t pái gōng, lōo-pinn ná ū Iú-ìng-kong.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 少年袂曉想，食老毋成樣
Siàu-liân bē-hiáu siūnn, tsia̍h-lāu m̄-tsiânn-iūnn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 尪姨順話尾，假童害眾人
Ang-î sūn uē-bué, ké tâng hāi tsìng-lâng.
Iù-siù kha, hó-miā té.
King-tsio thòo kiánn uī kiánn sí.
Tiunn-tî bô si̍h-pún.
Tik-sit Thóo-tī-kong, tshī bô ke.
Khiā kuân suann, khuànn bé sio that.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 心歹無人知，喙歹上厲害
Sim pháinn bô lâng tsai, tshuì pháinn siōng lī-hāi.
Lún-khì kiû tsâi, kik-khì sio-thâi.
Uàn senn bô uàn sí.
Tiām-tiām tsia̍h sann uánn-kong puànn.
Sioh hue liân phûn, thiànn kiánn liân sun.
Ok bé ok lâng khiâ.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 惹熊惹虎，毋通惹著刺查某
Jiá hîm jiá hóo, m̄-thang jiá-tio̍h tshiah-tsa-bóo.
Ài-suí m̄ kiann lâu phīnn-tsuí.
Ài piànn tsiah ē iânn.
Bān gû kāu-sái-jiō.
Gōng--ê iā ū tsi̍t hāng ē.
Hì-pênn kha khiā kú tō sī lí ê.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 戲館邊的豬母，袂歕簫嘛會拍拍
Hì-kuán pinn ê ti-bó, bē pûn siau mā ē phah-phik.
Tshiú phō hâi-jî, tsiah tsai pē-bú sî.
Tshiú-khiau, khut-ji̍p bô khut-tshut.
Phah lâng huah kiù-lâng.
Phah-tn̄g tshiú-kut tian-tò ióng.
Phah hóo lia̍h tsha̍t iā tio̍h tshin hiann-tī.
Tsia̍p mē bē thiann, tsia̍p phah bē thiànn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 掃地掃壁角，洗面洗耳空
Sàu-tè sàu piah-kak, sé-bīn sé hīnn-khang.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 揀啊揀，揀著一个賣龍眼
Kíng--ah kíng, kíng-tio̍h tsi̍t ê bē lîng-gíng.
Iô lâng bô-tsâi, iô ti bô thâi.
Gia̍h thâu sann tshioh ū sîn-bîng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 收瀾收離離，明年招小弟
Siu-nuā siu-lī-lī, mê-nî tsio sió-tī.
Pàng-phuì an káu sim.
Kà ti kà káu, put-jû ka-kī tsáu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 敢做匏桸，就毋通驚水燙
Kánn tsò pû-hia, tō m̄-thang kiann tsuí thǹg.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 斷掌查埔做相公，斷掌查某守空房
Tn̄g-tsiúnn tsa-poo tsò siùnn-kang, tn̄g-tsiúnn tsa-bóo tsiú-khang-pâng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 日頭赤焱焱，隨人顧性命
Ji̍t-thâu tshiah-iānn-iānn, suî lâng kòo sènn-miā.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 春天後母面，欲變一時間
Tshun-thinn āu-bú bīn, beh piàn tsi̍t sî-kan.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 春雺曝死鬼，夏雺做大水
Tshun bông pha̍k-sí kuí, hā bông tsò-tuā-tsuí.
Sī m̄ sī, mē ka-kī.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 時到時擔當，無米才煮番薯湯
Sî kàu sî tam-tng, bô bí tsiah tsú han-tsî thng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 暗頓減食一口，活甲九十九
Àm-tǹg kiám tsia̍h tsi̍t kháu, ua̍h kah káu-tsa̍p-káu.
Ē kā--lâng ê káu bē puī.
Ē-hiáu thau tsia̍h, bē-hiáu tshit tshuì.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 會生得囝身，袂生得囝心
Ē senn tit kiánn sin, bē senn tit kiánn sim.
Ē pua̍h tsiah ē tuā.
Ū tsi̍t hó, bô nn̄g hó.
Ū tn̂g-suann kong, bô tn̂g-suann má.
Ū tshuì kóng kah bô nuā.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 有囝有囝命，無囝天註定
Ū kiánn ū kiánn miā, bô kiánn thinn tsù-tiānn.
Ū iūnn khuànn iūnn, bô iūnn ka-kī siūnn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 有燒香有保庇，有食藥有行氣
Ū sio-hiunn ū pó-pì, ū tsia̍h io̍h ū kiânn-khì.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 有狀元學生，無狀元先生
Ū tsiōng-guân ha̍k-sing, bô tsiōng-guân sian-sinn.
Ū-liōng tō ū hok.
Ū tsia̍h koh ū lia̍h.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 未曾學行先學飛，未曾掖種想挽瓜
Buē-tsîng o̍h kiânn sing o̍h pue, buē-tsîng iā-tsíng siūnn bán kue.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 未食五日節粽，破裘毋甘放
Buē tsia̍h Gōo-ji̍t-tseh tsàng, phuà hiû m̄ kam pàng.
Pue-té m̄-thang tshī kim-hî.
Iau-kuí ké sè-jī.
Bóo-tuā-tsí, tsē kim kau-í.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 查埔也著疼，查某也著晟
Tsa-poo iā tio̍h thiànn, tsa-bóo iā tio̍h tshiânn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 查埔囝得田園，查某囝得嫁粧
Tsa-poo-kiánn tit tshân-hn̂g, tsa-bóo-kiánn tit kè-tsng.
Hāu-tiúnn kiam kòng tsing.
Toh-tíng tsia̍h-pn̄g, toh-kha pàng-sái.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 棚頂做甲流汗，棚跤嫌甲流瀾
Pênn tíng tsò kah lâu-kuānn, pênn kha hiâm kah lâu-nuā.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 樹頭徛予在，毋驚樹尾做風颱
Tshiū-thâu khiā hōo tsāi, m̄ kiann tshiū-bué tsò-hong-thai.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 欠錢怨債主，不孝怨爸母
Khiàm tsînn uàn tsè-tsú, put-hàu uàn pē-bú.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 欲好額等後世，欲做官學做戲
Beh hó-gia̍h tán āu-sì, beh tsò-kuann o̍h tsò-hì.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 歡歡喜喜一工，煩煩惱惱也一工
Huann-huann-hí-hí tsi̍t kang, huân-huân-ló-ló iā tsi̍t kang.
Uai tshuì ke tsia̍h hó bí.
Pháinn kue kāu-tsí, pháinn-lâng kāu giân-gí.
Pháinn tik tshut hó sún.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 歹竹出好筍，好竹出痀崙
Pháinn tik tshut hó sún, hó tik tshut ku-lún.
Pháinn tsûn tú-tio̍h hó káng-lōo.
Sí hông-tè m̄-ta̍t-tit ua̍h khit-tsia̍h.
Sí ba̍k m̄ guān kheh.
Sí tsuâ ua̍h bué-liu.
Sí tō-iú, bô sí pîn-tō.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 毛呼龜粿粽，紅包隨你送
Môo-honn ku kué tsàng, âng-pau suî lí sàng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 毛毛仔雨落久，塗嘛會澹
Mn̂g-mn̂g-á hōo lo̍h-kú, thôo mā ē tâm.
Khì-sí giām bô siong.
Niû-suànn sui phuà, kut-keh guân-tsāi.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 清明無轉厝，無祖；過年無轉厝，無某
Tshing-bîng bô tńg tshù, bô tsóo; kuè-nî bô tńg tshù, bô bóo.
Liu-liu-tshiu-tshiu, tsia̍h nn̄g luí ba̍k-tsiu.
Oo-á-hî tsìnn tsuí.
Oo kan-á té tāu-iû.
Bû sam put sîng lé.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 無彼號尻川，想欲食彼號瀉藥
Bô hit-lō kha-tshng, siūnn-beh tsia̍h hit-lō sià-io̍h.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 無日毋知晝，無鬚毋知老
Bô ji̍t m̄ tsai tàu, bô tshiu m̄ tsai lāu.
Bô kê giâ kau-í.
Bô môo ke ké tuā-keh.
Bô gû sái-bé.
Bô kìm bô khī, tsia̍h pah-jī.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 無米有舂臼，無囝抱新婦
Bô bí ū tsing-khū, bô kiánn phō sin-pū.
Bô thang tshenn tsia̍h, ná ū thang pha̍k-kuann.
Bô hî, hê mā hó.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 燒瓷的食缺，織蓆的睏椅
Sio-huî--ê tsia̍h khih, tsit-tshio̍h--ê khùn í.
Nuā thôo bē kôo tit piah.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 爸母疼囝長流水，囝疼爸母樹尾風
Pē-bú thiànn kiánn tn̂g lâu-tsuí, kiánn thiànn pē-bú tshiū-bué hong.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 牛就是牛，牽到北京也是牛
Gû tō sī gû, khan kàu Pak-kiann iā sī gû.
Gû-tiâu-lāi tak gû-bó.
Khan ang-î, sūn uē-bué.
Káu bô hiâm tsú-lâng sàn.
Kâu iā ē pua̍h-lo̍h tshiū-kha.
Ông-lâi thâu, si-kue bué.
Kam-tsià bô siang thâu tinn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 甘願做牛，毋驚無犁通拖
Kam-guān tsò gû, m̄ kiann bô lê thang thua.
Senn kiánn sai-á, tshī kiánn sai-hū.
Tshenn-kông káu tsia̍h bô sái.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 生的請一邊，養的恩情較大天
Senn--ê tshiánn tsi̍t pinn, ióng--ê un-tsîng khah tuā thinn.
Senn ke-nn̄g bô, pàng ke-sái ū.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 生食都無夠，哪有通曝乾
Tshenn tsia̍h to bô-kàu, ná ū thang pha̍k-kuann.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 用別人的拳頭拇舂石獅
Iōng pa̍t-lâng ê kûn-thâu-bó tsing tsio̍h-sai.
Tshân-lê kâm tsuí kuè tang.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 畫虎畫皮無畫骨，知人知面不知心
Uē hóo uē phuê bô uē kut, ti jîn ti bīn put ti-sim.
Gî lâng, m̄ tsiânn tsha̍t.
He-ku bē lún tit sàu.
Siáu káu tsing bōng-khòng.
Siáu-tham nǹg ke-lam.
Sán tshân gâu suh tsuí.
Pe̍h-pe̍h pòo ní kah oo.
Phî-phî tsia̍h kah lâu-tsî.
Tsīn jîn-sū, sūn thinn-ì.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 目睭掛斗概，看人物就愛
Ba̍k-tsiu kuà táu-kài, khuànn lâng mi̍h tō ài.
Ba̍k-tsiu khuànn tī kué, kha ta̍h-tio̍h hué.
Ba̍k-tsiu khuànn-kuân, bô khuànn-kē.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 目睭花花，匏仔看做菜瓜
Ba̍k-tsiu hue-hue, pû-á khuànn-tsò tshài-kue.
Ba̍k-tsiu kim-kim lâng siong-tiōng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 相分食有賰，相搶食無份
Sio-pun tsia̍h ū tshun, sio-tshiúnn tsia̍h bô hūn.
Siòng-miā bô po, tsia̍h tsuí to bô.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 相罵無揀喙，相拍無揀位
Sio-mē bô kíng tshuì, sio-phah bô kíng uī.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 看人食肉，毋通看人相拍
Khuànn lâng tsia̍h bah, m̄-thang khuànn lâng sio-phah.
Sîn-bîng hing, tē-tsú kîng.
Tán mi̍h oh kàu, tán lâng khuài lāu.
Âng suí, oo tuā-pān.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 細漢偷挽匏，大漢偷牽牛
Sè-hàn thau bán pû, tuā-hàn thau khan gû.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 細漢煩惱伊袂大，大漢煩惱伊袂娶
Sè-hàn huân-ló i bē tuā, tuā-hàn huân-ló i bē tshuā.
Sè khang m̄ póo, tuā khang kiò-khóo.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 緊紡無好紗，緊嫁無好大家
Kín pháng bô hó se, kín kè bô hó ta-ke.
Kín kiânn bô hó pōo.
Khih-tshuì--ê tsia̍h bí-hún──khuànn-hiān-hiān.
Bóng thàn khah bē sàn.
Ang-á-bóo sī sio-khiàm-tsè .

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 翁某若仝心，烏塗變成金
Ang-bóo nā kāng sim, oo-thôo piàn-sîng kim.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 翁親某親，老婆仔拋捙輪
Ang tshin bóo tshin, lāu-pô-á pha-tshia-lin.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 老人毋講古，少年毋捌寶
Lāu-lâng m̄ kóng-kóo, siàu-liân m̄ bat pó.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 老的老步定，少年的較懂嚇
Lāu--ê lāu-pōo-tiānn, siàu-liân--ê khah táng-hiannh.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 耳仔生兩葉，家己看袂著
Hīnn-á senn nn̄g hio̍h, ka-kī khuànn bē tio̍h.
Thiann bóo tshuì, tuā hù-kuì.
Hôo-sîn bú sái-pue.
Pak-tóo tsò io̍h-tû.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 腹肚若水櫃，胸坎若樓梯
Pak-tóo ná tsuí-kuī, hing-khám ná lâu-thui.
Phòng-hong tsuí-ke thâi bô bah.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 臭頭仔嘛會做皇帝，做總統你嘛有機會
Tshàu-thâu-á mā ē tsò hông-tè, tsò tsóng-thóng lí mā ū ki-huē.
Tâi-uân tsînn, im kha-ba̍k.
Kū siû tsia̍h sin siû.
Tsûn kuè tsuí bô hûn.
Kan-khóo thâu, khuìnn-ua̍h bué.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 花無百日紅，人無千日好
Hue bô pah ji̍t âng, lâng bô tshian ji̍t hó.
Tsháu-tē tshin-ke tsē tuā-uī.
Tshài thâng tsia̍h tshài, tshài-kha sí.
Bān-sū khí-thâu lân.
Lo̍h-thôo-sî peh-jī miā.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 落水平平沉，全無重頭輕
Lo̍h tsuí pênn-pênn tîm, tsuân bô tāng-thâu-khin.
Kiânn-tsûn tsáu bé sann hun miā.
Bē-hiáu thì-thâu, tú-tio̍h hôo-tshiu.
Sai-pak-hōo, lo̍h bē kuè tshia-lōo.
Si-kue uá tuā pîng.
Kiàn-siàu tńg siū-khì.
Sîng-ì tsia̍h tsuí tinn.
Kóng tsi̍t ê iánn, senn tsi̍t ê kiánn.
Kóng-tio̍h tsia̍h, tsing-phuà hia̍h.
Tha̍k-tsheh, tha̍k tī kha-tsiah-phiann.
Ti-siū m̄-ta̍t káu-siū ún.
Ti m̄ tuā, tuā tuì káu khì.
Ti-thâu m̄ kòo, kòo ah-bó nn̄g.
Ti-thâu-phuê tsuànn bô iû.
Tsâi tsú siū sann jī tsuân.
Bé tshù, bé tshù-pinn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 買田愛揀好田底，娶某愛揀好娘嬭
Bé tshân ài kíng hó tshân té, tshuā-bóo ài kíng hó niû-lé.
Bé-bē sǹg hun, sio-tshiánn bô lūn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 賣茶講茶芳，賣花講花紅
Bē tê kóng tê phang, bē hue kóng hue âng.
Thàn iā tio̍h thàn, tsia̍h iā tio̍h tsia̍h.
Thàn-tsînn iú sòo, sènn-miā ài kòo.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 跋一倒，抾著一隻金雞母
Pua̍h tsi̍t tó, khioh-tio̍h tsi̍t tsiah kim ke-bó.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 輸人毋輸陣，輸陣歹看面
Su lâng m̄ su tīn, su tīn pháinn-khuànn bīn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 近山剉無柴，近溪擔無水
Kīn suann tshò bô tshâ, kīn khe tann bô tsuí.
Kīn biō khi sîn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 近水知魚性，近山識鳥音
Kīn suí ti hî sìng, kīn san sik niáu im.
Sàng i hî, khah-su kà i lia̍h hî.
Tsit khe bô hî, pa̍t khe tiò.
Kuè-sî bē la̍h-ji̍t.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 過橋較濟你行路，食鹽較濟你食米
Kuè kiô khah tsē lí kiânn-lōo, tsia̍h iâm khah tsē lí tsia̍h bí.
Phoo bīn than, tsìm tsuí ô .
Tsînn sì kha, lâng nn̄g kha.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 三人共五目，日後無長短跤話
sann lâng kāng gōo ba̍k, ji̍t-āu bô tn̂g-té-kha uē.
Iam-ke thàn hōng pue.
Kuainn-mn̂g tio̍h tshuànn, kóng-uē tio̍h khuànn.
Im-thim im-thim, kā lâng sann tshùn tshim.
Keh-piah tshin-ke, lé-sòo guân-tsāi.
Siang ê tsn̄g, ok kah bô lâng mn̄g.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 雙手抱孩兒，才知爸母時
Siang-tshiú phō hâi-jî, tsiah tsai pē-bú sî.
Tsa̍p-liām ta-ke tshut bân-phuê sin-pū.
Ke-nn̄g ba̍t-ba̍t iā ū phāng.
Ke sái lo̍h thôo, iā ū sann tshùn ian.
Lī hiunn, bô lī khiunn.
Tshenn-mê niau kā-tio̍h sí niáu-tshí.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 靠山山會崩，靠水水會焦
Khò suann suann ē pang, khò tsuí tsuí ē ta.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 頂司管下司，鋤頭管畚箕
Tíng-si kuán ē-si, tî-thâu kuán pùn-ki.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 頂港有名聲，下港上出名
Tíng-káng ū miâ-siann, ē-káng siōng tshut-miâ.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 頭大面四方，肚大居財王
Thâu tuā bīn sù-hong, tóo tuā ki tsâi-ông.
Thâu sio-sio, bué líng-líng.
Tsia̍h lâng tsi̍t kháu, pò lâng tsi̍t táu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 食人一斤，也著還人四兩
Tsia̍h lâng tsi̍t kin, iā tio̍h hîng lâng sì niú.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 食人頭鍾酒，講人頭句話
Tsia̍h lâng thâu tsing tsiú, kóng lâng thâu kù uē.
Tsia̍h hó tàu sio-pò.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 食果子拜樹頭；食米飯拜田頭
Tsia̍h kué-tsí pài tshiū-thâu; tsia̍h bí-pn̄g pài tshân-thâu.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 食無三把蕹菜，就欲上西天
Tsia̍h bô sann pé ìng-tshài, tō beh tsiūnn se-thian.
Tsia̍h tinn tsia̍h kiâm, tshàu kha-phīnn-liâm.
Tsia̍h uánn-lāi, sueh uánn-guā.
Tsia̍h bí m̄ tsai bí kè.
Tsia̍h-kín lòng-phuà uánn.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 食著藥，青草一葉；食毋著藥，人參一石
Tsia̍h tio̍h io̍h, tshinn-tsháu tsi̍t hio̍h; tsia̍h m̄-tio̍h io̍h, jîn-sim tsi̍t tsio̍h.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 食雞，會起家；食鰇魚，生囡仔好育飼
Tsia̍h ke, ē khí-ke; tsia̍h jiû-hî, senn gín-á hó io-tshī.
Tsia̍h-pn̄g hông-tè tuā.
Tsia̍h pá uānn iau.
Tsia̍h hî tsia̍h bah, iā tio̍h tshài kah.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 飼囝無論飯，飼爸母算頓
Tshī kiánn bô-lūn pn̄g, tshī pē-bú sǹg tǹg.
Tshī niáu-tshí, kā pòo-tē.
Pá-suī ê tiū-á, thâu lê-lê.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 驚某大丈夫，拍某豬狗牛
Kiann bóo tāi-tiōng-hu, phah bóo ti káu gû.
Kiann-kiann bē tio̍h tíng.
Kut-la̍t tsia̍h-la̍t, pîn-tuānn thun nuā.
Ah-á thiann luî.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 龍交龍，鳳交鳳，隱痀的交侗戇
Lîng kau lîng, hōng kau hōng, ún-ku--ê kau tòng-gōng.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 龜笑鱉無尾，鱉笑龜粗皮
Ku tshiò pih bô bué, pih tshiò ku tshoo phuê.
Ku-kha sô--tshut-lâi.
Ku-kha ku-lāi bah.

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 補鼎補生鍋，修理雨傘，修理面桶蓋  Póo-tiánn póo senn-ue, siu-lí hōo-suànn, siu-lí bīn-tháng kuà.
一隻蝦猴配三碗糜    Tsi̍t tsiah hê-kâu phèr sann uánn bêr.
仙人拍鼓有時錯，跤步踏差啥人無
Sian-jîn phah kóo iú sî tshò, kha-pōo ta̍h-tsha siánn-lâng bô?

䆀猴𠢕欠數: 收瀾收予焦，予你生一个有
Siu-nuā siu hōo ta, hōo lí senn tsi̍t ê ū lān-pha.
